Class OfficerInterface

java.lang.Object
bto.Boundaries.OfficerInterface
public class OfficerInterface extends Object
Provides the user interface and interaction logic for HDB Officer users in the BTO (Build-To-Order) Management System. Handles various functions including project management, enquiries, bookings, and personal profile management.

      Constructor initializes all controllers and dependencies.
      Parameters:
      scanner - Input scanner for user interactions
      authController - Controller for authentication processes
      projectController - Controller for project-related operations
      applicationController - Controller for managing applications
      enquiryController - Controller for handling enquiries
      reportController - Controller for generating reports
      registrationController - Controller for user registration
      withdrawalController - Controller for managing withdrawals
      bookingController - Controller for booking operations
      receiptGenerator - Generator for creating receipts
      userInterface - Reference to the main user interface

      public void setCurrentOfficer(HDBOfficer Officer)
      Sets the current logged-in officer for the interface.
      Parameters:
      Officer - The HDB Officer to set as the current user

      public HDBOfficer getCurrentOfficer()
      Retrieves the current logged-in officer.
      Returns:
      The currently logged-in HDB Officer

    • displayOfficerMenu

      public void displayOfficerMenu(HDBOfficer officer)
      Displays the main menu for an HDB Officer user. Provides access to various functions like project browsing, enquiry management, booking processing, etc.
      Parameters:
      officer - The currently logged-in HDB Officer
